meanings.definition: The state of being derived from a single ancestral group.
meanings.sent1: The monophylies of these species show their shared ancestry.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study monophylies to understand evolutionary relationships.
meanings.sent3: The monophylies at the family reunion made for some interesting conversations.
meanings.sent4: The monophylies of the family tree traced back to a common root.
meanings.sent5: Learning about monophylies helps us see how all living things are connected.

meanings.definition: A group of organisms that consists of all the descendants of a common ancestor.
meanings.sent1: The monophylies of these birds include all their offspring.
meanings.sent2: The monophylies of this plant species are well-documented.
meanings.sent3: The monophylies of the ant colony were quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: The monophylies of the wolf pack highlighted their strong family bonds.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the monophylies of different species reveals the beauty of evolution.
